info.title: Application Model Manager
info.description: Provides na interface for some basic functionality for applications.

method.name: getApplicationManifests
method.description: Get all application manifest permissions from the application library path.
method.returndescription: An array of all manifests' information by id.

method.name: getAppSettings
method.description: Get application settings manager according to runtime.

parameter.name: $applicationVersion
parameter.description: The application version for production. Leave empty to get last application version. It is empty by default.

method.name: getAppLibraryStyles
method.description: Get all application styles from the library.

parameter.name: $applicationVersion
parameter.description: The application version for production. Leave empty to get last application version. It is empty by default.

method.returndescription: An array with all application library styles.

method.name: getAppLibraryScripts
method.description: Get all application scripts from the library.

parameter.name: $applicationVersion
parameter.description: The application version for production. Leave empty to get last application version. It is empty by default.

method.returndescription: An array with all application library scripts.

method.name: getAppViews
method.description: Get application views list according to runtime.

parameter.name: $applicationVersion
parameter.description: The application version for production. Leave empty to get last application version. It is empty by default.

method.returndescription: An array containing the application views in full path (including folders). NULL if there was an error.

method.name: getApplicationPath
method.description: Gets the application's library path to the given version.

method.name: getApplicationInfo
method.description: Get application information for a given version regarding the release version.

parameter.name: $version
parameter.description: The application version. If empty, get the last published and approved version. It is empty by default.

method.returndescription: An array of all application information including release title, project description, icon url and more.

method.name: getApplicationIconUrl
method.description: Get the application's icon url according to the given version.
method.returndescription: Returns the icon url or NULL if the application doesn't have an icon.

method.name: getApplicationLibraryCSS
method.description: Get the application library css code.

parameter.name: $cssFileName
parameter.description: The css file name from the application library.

parameter.name: $applicationVersion
parameter.description: The application version, for production mode.

method.name: getApplicationLibraryJS
method.description: Get the application library js code.

parameter.name: $jsFileName
parameter.description: The js file name from the application library.

parameter.name: $applicationVersion
parameter.description: The application version, for production mode.

method.name: getTeamApplicationFolder
method.description: Get the application service path inside the team folder.
method.returndescription: The application path or NULL if there is no active application.

method.name: getAccountApplicationFolder
method.description: Get the application service path inside the account folder.
method.returndescription: The application path or NULL if there is no active application.

method.name: getAppFolderName
method.description: Get the application folder name as a service.

method.name: getTeamApplicationPath
method.description: Get the application service path inside the team folder.
method.returndescription: The application path or NULL if there is no active application.

method.name: getAccountApplicationPath
method.description: Get the application service path inside the account folder.
method.returndescription: The application path or NULL if there is no active application.

method.name: getAppLibraryObjects
method.description: Get all library objects with the given name (tag name).

parameter.name: $applicationVersion
parameter.description: The application version for production. Leave empty to get last application version. It is empty by default.

method.returndescription: An array of all application library objects.

method.name: getFolders
method.description: Get an array of all the folders under the given path.

parameter.name: $parent
parameter.description: The folder to look down from. The default value is empty, for the root. Separate each folder with "/".

method.returndescription: A nested array of all the folders under the given path.

method.name: getFolderViews
method.description: Get all views in a given folder.

parameter.name: $parent
parameter.description: The folder to look down from. The default value is empty, for the root. Separate each folder with "/".
